00030 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00031         
00032 
00033         
00034         
00043         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00044                 $this->gp = $gp;
00045                 $this->settings = $settings;
00046                 
00047                 //read redirect page
00048                 $email_redirect = $settings['redirectPage'];
00049                 
00050                 //if redirect_page was page id
00051                 if (is_numeric($email_redirect)) {
00052                 
00053                         // these parameters have to be added to the redirect url
00054                         $addparams = array();
00055                         if (t3lib_div::_GP("L")) {
00056                                 $addparams["L"] = t3lib_div::_GP("L");
00057                         }
00058                         
00059                         $url = $this->cObj->getTypoLink_URL($email_redirect, '',$addparams);
00060                         
00061                 //else it may be a full URL
00062                 } else {
00063                         $url = $email_redirect;
00064                 }
00065                 
00066                 //correct the URL by replacing &amp;
00067                 if ($settings['correctRedirectUrl']) { 
00068                         $url = str_replace('&amp;', '&', $url);
00069                 }
00070                 
00071                 if($url) {
00072                         header("Location: ".t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl($url));
00073                 }
00074                 exit();
00075         }
00076         
00077 }
00078 ?>
